description: "This map shows the border between the British Empire (modern Bangladesh) and Burmah (Myanmar). Although the Burmah part of the map is mostly blank, there is a reference to ‘Shendoos’ (now known as the Lai people)."
title: "Eastern British frontier bordering on Burmah and Munneepoor. [map] : From latest surveys. Corrected up to April 1871."
